name: DeleteUserLinkedObject
description:
Delete a user's linked object relationship.

Use this tool to delete an existing linked object relationship between a specified user and their associated primary relationship. It's successful whether or not such a relationship exists.

parameters.name: user_identifier_or_login
parameters.description: The ID or login of the user to delete the relationship for. Use 'me' to represent the current session user.

value_schema.description:
If for the `self` link, this is the ID of the user for whom you want to get the primary user ID. If for the `associated` relation, this is the user ID or login value of the user assigned the associated relationship.

This can be `me` to represent the current session user.

parameters.name: relationship_name
parameters.description: Name of the `primary` or `associated` relationship to be deleted.

value_schema.description: Name of the `primary` or `associated` relationship being queried

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the okta API.

If for the `self` link, this is the ID of the user for whom you want to get the primary user ID. If for the `associated` relation, this is the user ID or login value of the user assigned the associated relationship.

This can be `me` to represent the current session user.

value_schema.description:
If for the `self` link, this is the ID of the user for whom you want to get the primary user ID. If for the `associated` relation, this is the user ID or login value of the user assigned the associated relationship.

This can be `me` to represent the current session user.

parameters.name: relationshipName
parameters.description: Name of the `primary` or `associated` relationship being queried

value_schema.description: Name of the `primary` or `associated` relationship being queried

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
